page.title: 10Chidren's Recreation
page.content: The village of Wigtown provides certain{recreational}opportunities for children. There is the{golf course} which children can play on in the afternoon, although children have to be accompanied by an adult after 7pm. There are also{bowling}and tennis facilities. Certain{clubs}are run for the children in the village. On Monday night there is a Life boys club, and for the girls there are Guides and Brownies. There is also a pools table in the Grapes Inn, which children can play on and there is a pool table in the Golf club house. In the cafe, there are some games machines that children can use. There is also a facility of a football pitch at Trammonford park.
